cakes.Author: Victoria Hargreaves
cakes.Title: Chocolate Cupcake
cakes.Synopsis: Created a batch of Chocolate Cupcakes, it was one of the best recipes I have ever used, highly recommend. Recipe can be found at www.choccakes.co.uk.

cakes.Author: Alice Clark
cakes.Title: Vanilla Cupcake
cakes.Synopsis: The Icing that has been piped on this Vanilla Cupcake, was a recipe I used from www.finchbakery.com website, I also use the equipment they sell including piping nozzles to pipe the icing onto the cupcake and the equipment is all high quality and the best I have ever used.

cakes.Author: John Smith
cakes.Title: Chocolate Fudge Cake
cakes.Synopsis: Bought the Betty Crocker Chocolate Fudge Cake Packet Mix and Ready Made icing, great for a quick bake and tastes delicious, can be found in most major supermarkets

cakes.Author: Jessica Jones
cakes.Title: Victoria Sponge
cakes.Synopsis: Simple but delicious. This Victoria sponge cake has been created using the recipe from www.isabakes.com and it is highly recommended for a simple bake.
